name: Adjustments for gains and losses already accounted for (P&L) and adjustments for the case of a default (Adjustment)
description: Corresponds to the sum of (i) P&L(long) or P&L(short), as applicable, referred to in Article 325w(1), (2) and (5) CRR and (ii) Adjustment(long) or Adjustment(short), as applicable, referred to in that same article
